Class HierarchicalRelation

  • java.lang.Object
    • tatami.core.agent.hierarchical.HierarchicalRelation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class HierarchicalRelation
extends java.lang.Object
implements jade.util.leap.Serializable
    This class represents hierarchical relationship between agents. An agent has a parent and a list of children
